frontMatter.title: Public Relations Activity Plan
frontMatter.metaDescription: Strategize to enhance the image of the product brand and focus on influential media strategies.

checklist.question: Did you research on PR strategies?
checklist.expectation: Review your previous efforts, why did it worked or not? If you are new to the market, tactics of your competitors and others in your industry.

checklist.question: Have you identified your goals and outcomes?
checklist.expectation: Your PR strategy should tie in with your overall goals and objectives.

checklist.question: Have you identified any opportunities?
checklist.expectation: Identify events or activities that present great opportunities for good public relations activities. In doing so, itâ€™s a good idea to look at both internal and external events.
